text: Gei dangi nei, gei goodou gu hai baahi gi di madahaanau o dogu damana. Goodou gu daaligi nia dama daane a maa gii mmade, nia daane e madahidu i hongo di hadugalaa e dahi, mai hua i di gili o Abimelech, go dana dama daane mai i baahi dana ahina hai hegau, idimaa mee tuaahina ni goodou, gei goodou guu hai a mee di king o Shechem.
